title: Déjà vu for Hamilton as Ferrari struggles echo his Mercedes misery
summary: Lewis Hamilton left Saudi Arabia in a downbeat mood after finishing 30 seconds behind Charles Leclerc. Like in 2024, the Briton is struggling to find answers

qa_pairs.question: Which team does Lewis Hamilton currently drive for?
Who finished ahead of Lewis Hamilton in the Saudi Arabian Grand Prix?
In what year did Lewis Hamilton struggle significantly, similar to his current performance?
